title: UN co-ordinator in Sri Lanka calls on President Rajapaksa
content: Onlanka News – Janaka Alahapperuma (Pix By: Chandana Perera) UN Resident and Humanitarian co-ordinator in Sri Lanka,Subinay Nandy calls on President Mahinda Rajapaksa at Temple Trees today on 31 May. Secretary to the President Lalith Weeratunga and Officials at UN Colombo Office were also present at the Occasion….
